channel.title: sigh on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in sigh on Barefoot Rob

item.title: 2.77777 MB per second
item.description: ##22:24 Wednesday 21 January 2015 JST## OS X Updater detected nothin’ because bah moe joe, and App Store was unable to download XCode 6.1 because harumf harumf, but I was able to download it from https://developer.apple.com/downloads/index.action?name=Xcode. It’s downloading at 2.7777 MB per second according to a URL-of-the-Google calculation. But my connection pulls down at 4+ MB per second from proper CDNs. Can’t Apple afford a proper CDN?

item.title: Disgusting lunch
item.description: ##13:31 Tuesday 02 December 2014 JST## I went to an Indian restaurant for lunch today, and was enjoying veggie curry and nan when two, ahem, people lit up cigarettes across from me in the restaurant. I switched to gobble mode on my curry, left 80% of the nan and put on my jacket. The manager was like, “oh would you like your tea?” “No; I gotta go. You’ve got two fuckers here smoking and it’s disgusting.
